short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ImageColor is a creative tool for finding precise colors in any image

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ImageColors is a design tool for finding the exact colors in any image. By uploading an image and clicking anywhere on it, you can find precise RGB, Hex, and CMYK values for your next design. Invert the image to find complementary colors, and use the Grayscale filter for shades of gray. 

Use cases include:
- Web Design
- Color Palette Creation
- Apparel
- Graphic Design
- Video Editing
